description: A cameraman and a war correspondent in the SNN, he believes in presenting both sides of a story even if he has to sneak into an enemy stronghold in the heat of a battle just to get it. He thinks http://anidb.net/ch35306 [Hibiki] doesn`t understand what journalism is really all about but nevertheless sees potential in him. He dies during http://anidb.net/ch35306 [Hibiki]`s first assignment with him after being caught in an explosion in a Marduk battleship where they found an unconscious http://anidb.net/ch35303 [Ishtar], and his death has a significant impact on how http://anidb.net/ch35306 [Hibiki] looks at the world of journalism.Source: wiki
name: Dennis Lone
